alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Columbus; Inland Brunswick (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 31 at 3:56PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Brunswick, southern Columbus and eastern Horry Counties through 430 PM EDT... At 356 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms approaching Little River, SC, moving east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Myrtle Beach, North Myrtle Beach, Little River, North Myrtle Beach Airport, Cherry Grove Inlet, Iredell, Carolina Shores, Calabash, Freeland, Exum, Bughill, Longwood, Barefoot Landing Area Of North Myrtle Beach, Wampee, Ash, Cherry Grove Beach, Hand, Longs, Pireway and Dulah. This includes the following highways... US Route 17 in Brunswick County between mile markers 1 and 6. SC Highway 31 between mile markers 12 and 24. SC Highway 22 between mile markers 22 and 26. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
